com.mygdx.game.model

Class GameStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.model.GameStats

  • public class GameStats
extends java.lang.Object
    GameStats is a class that contains and deals with the game information, such has score, number of kills, level of game and the hero health points.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameStats(int level, int heroHp)
      Constructor of class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getHeroHp()
      Returns the current hero's health points.
      int getKills()
      Returns number of enemy kills of the game.
      int getLevel()
      Returns the current level of the game.
      int getScore()
      Returns the current score of the game.
      void incKills()
      Increments by 1 the number of enemy kills.
      void incLevel()
      Increments by 1 the level of the game.
      void incScore(int points)
      Increments the current score with the value given.
      void setHeroHp(int hp)
      Sets the hero health points with the value given.
